name: Allen Hsu
body:
### Welcome to Allen Hsu's home page!
This website contains personal information about Allen Hsu, and other information.

### Introduction
I am a Canadian student who immigrated from Taiwan, a small island beside China. The main reason we moved to Canada was the education in Taiwan, it is way too much for a student to handle.

### Moving to Canada
It took the immigrant agency about four years until they came out with a result, after we received the result, we packed up right away and moved here. It was not easy at the beginning, since I did not know a lot of English. But I eventually became really good at speaking it, and everything started to go really well in high school.

### Things I like:
* Text editor Vim with the Solarized colour scheme
* Programming in the language C
* Professional typesetting program called LaTeX
* Massive Multiplayer game League of Legends
* Age of Empires II: the Conquerors

### Present
Lately I have been working on my programming skills in Objective-C, object oriented programming, and iOS Apps development.

### Future
I am planning on going to Queen's University for either commerce or enginnering. Or Waterloo University for software engineering.

### Extras
#### Contact Info
Email: hsu.y.allen@gmail.com

Other info coming soon!
